android.manifestAdditions: <manifest android:installLocation="auto"> <uses-sdk android:minSdkVersion="8" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.INTERNET" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE" /> <application> <service android:name="com.yandex.metrica.MetricaService" android:enabled="true" android:exported="true" android:process=":Metrica"> <intent-filter> <category android:name="android.intent.category.DEFAULT"/> <action android:name="com.yandex.metrica.IMetricaService"/> <data android:scheme="metrica"/> </intent-filter> <meta-data android:name="metrica:api:level" android:value="52"/> </service> <receiver android:name="com.menu4me.ane.appmetrica.InstallReferrerReceiver" android:enabled="true" android:exported="true"> <intent-filter> <action android:name="com.android.vending.INSTALL_REFERRER"/> </intent-filter> </receiver> <!--<receiver android:name="com.yandex.metrica.MetricaEventHandler" android:enabled="true" android:exported="true"> <intent-filter> <action android:name="com.android.vending.INSTALL_REFERRER"/> </intent-filter> </receiver>--> </application> </manifest>
